main.name: Ameer Hamza
main.description: I work on Frontends & DevOps Engineer.
main.bio: Hi there! I am Ameer Hamza! You might be looking for Frontend Developer/ DevOps Engineer for your growing team then you are on the right place. Experience in Agile and Waterfall Methodologies and delivery on timely basis. Hands on Experience on CI Tools likes Jenkins Strong experience with using broad range of Aws Services. I've been coding for over 3+ years now. I am experienced in working Agile environment As a Frontend developer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. I develop applications and determine the structure and design of web pages, striking a balance between functional and aesthetic design, and ensuring web design is optimized for smartphones. I design the applications by using Tailwind, bootstrap, Material Ui, styled-components and custom styling(SCSS). I build web apps by converting the PSD and Figma design into responsive screens.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me if you want me to be part of your growing team.
